title: Ramaphosa Vows to Fight Impeachment Report and Seek Re-election
description: The South African president had considered resigning after Parliament released a report last week accusing him of violating his oath of office by obscuring details about a 2020 robbery at his game farm.

title: Rogue Wave Strikes Cruise Ship, Killing a Passenger
description: Four other passengers were hurt after a large, unpredictable wave hit the ship, which was traveling toward the Antarctic, Viking Cruises said.

title: Why Is Rahul Gandhi Walking 2,000 Miles Across India?
description: Rahul Gandhi is hoping to pull his once-mighty party out of the political wilderness. The future of India as a multiparty democracy may be on the line.

title: Ukraine Calls for Evacuations From a Russian-Controlled Area
description: A Ukrainian official urged civilians to leave the eastern bank of the Dnipro River, across from the city of Kherson, warning of the “possible intensification of hostilities” there.

title: Your Holiday Rituals
description: Rituals make the season meaningful for many of you.

title: After Half a Century, Prince Edward Island’s Musical Tradition Takes a Break
description: The musical theater version of “Anne of Green Gables,” a favorite of tourists from around the world, will now be staged only every other year.

title: After Half a Century, Prince Edward Island’s Musical Tradition Takes a Break
description: The musical theater version of “Anne of Green Gables,” a favorite of tourists from around the world, will now be staged only every other year.

title: After Fanning Covid Fears, China Must Now Try to Allay Them
description: Beijing had long warned that the only effective response was testing, quarantine and lockdowns. As it shifts policy, it must change how it portrays the risks.

title: With Mauna Loa’s Eruption, a Rare Glimpse Into the Earth
description: The world’s largest active volcano erupted for the first time in 38 years, raising excitement among scientists who are eager to unlock its many mysteries.

title: Landslide Tragedy Turns Italy’s Focus to Illegal Construction
description: After 11 deaths, a series of government amnesties for illegally built homes is becoming a focus of a blame game.

title: He Returned a Dazed Soldier to the Russians. Ukraine Calls It Treason.
description: No one knew what to do with a lost Russian pilot who suddenly appeared in the occupied city of Kherson. The case has revealed the blurred line between pragmatism in a war zone and collaboration with the enemy.

title: As Macron Loses His Sheen at Home, Harmonious U.S. Visit Is ‘Regenerative’
description: President Emmanuel Macron, dealing with a difficult start to his second term, can return to France feeling buoyed by a warm reception and unity on Ukraine.

title: U.S. Sees Little Prospect for Ukraine Talks With Putin After Biden Offer
description: The Kremlin reaffirmed a stance that both Washington and Kyiv find unacceptable, and U.S. officials said Mr. Biden’s position had not changed.

title: Zelensky Proposes Banning Ukrainian Orthodox Church Led by Putin Ally
description: Ukraine’s president called for legislation to prevent an ancient branch of the Orthodox Church, led by a Putin ally, from operating in his country, but it remains unclear how that would work.
